title: So is Rek'sai balanced?
body:
-Manaless
-High mobility
-Low cooldowns
-High damage
-Sustain with passive
-Free attack speed
-Free teleport
-Knockup on a low cooldown
-Can go over walls
-Free radar to know where everyone is

I mean I feel like Rek'sai has an overloaded as fuck kit, but do you guys think she's balanced?
